v1.helmValues:
global:
  # Default hub for Istio images.
  # Releases are published to docker hub under 'istio' project.
  # Daily builds from prow are on gcr.io, and nightly builds from circle on docker.io/istionightly
  hub: gcr.io/istio-release
  # Default tag for Istio images.
  tag: master-latest-daily
  # imagePullPolicy is applied to istio control plane components.
  # local tests require IfNotPresent, to avoid uploading to dockerhub.
  # TODO: Switch to Always as default, and override in the local tests.
  imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
certmanager:
  enabled: false
v1.helmValuesDefaults:
global:
  # Default hub for Istio images.
  # Releases are published to docker hub under 'istio' project.
  # Daily builds from prow are on gcr.io, and nightly builds from circle on docker.io/istionightly
  hub: gcr.io/istio-release

  # Default tag for Istio images.
  tag: master-latest-daily

  # imagePullPolicy is applied to istio control plane components.
  # local tests require IfNotPresent, to avoid uploading to dockerhub.
  # TODO: Switch to Always as default, and override in the local tests.
  imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

certmanager:
  enabled: false

patches./clusterrole.yaml:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  annotations:
    manifestctl.sam.data.sfdc.net/swagger: disable
  name: istio-init-mesh-control-plane
patches./clusterrolebinding.yaml:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  annotations:
    manifestctl.sam.data.sfdc.net/swagger: disable
  name: istio-init-admin-role-binding-mesh-control-plane
patches./job-crd-10.yaml:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: istio-init-crd-10
  namespace: mesh-control-plane
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: istio-init-crd-10
        image: mcpIstioConfig.kubectlImage
      nodeSelector:
        pool: mcpIstioConfig.istioEstate
patches./job-crd-11.yaml:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: istio-init-crd-11
  namespace: mesh-control-plane
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: istio-init-crd-11
        image: mcpIstioConfig.kubectlImage
      nodeSelector:
        pool: mcpIstioConfig.istioEstate
patches./serviceaccount.yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ServiceAccount
metadata:
  annotations:
    manifestctl.sam.data.sfdc.net/swagger: disable
  name: istio-init-service-account
  namespace: mesh-control-plane

metadata.name: istio-init
metadata.releaseNotes:
Add helm resource-policy to CRDs to prevent deletion (#12484)

* Add helm resource-policy to CRDs to prevent deletion

* Remove crd-install - add keep

Based upon Stono's suggestion, cleaning up his PR a bit.
